text: Life skills are abilities which help people to deal with the demands and challenges that they face in life. The World Health Organization in 1999 identified cross-cultural areas of life skills: * Decision-making and problem solving. * Creative thinking (see also lateral thinking and critical thinking) * Communication and social skills. * Self-awareness and empathy. * Assertiveness and equanimity; Most of the times children get life skills when they play or discover new things with adults. == Further reading == * == References == Category:Life skills
